definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to move as in a dance/to wave (some implement)/to flourish/(of eyes, hands etc) to dance/to flutter
to flutter/to dance in the breeze
to dance energetically/vigorous modern style of dance

sentences.english: Some girls sprang up a dance immediately, other of just stand the side of the side confabulation see.
sentences.chinese: 一些女孩立刻跳起了舞，其他的只是站着邊交談邊看。

sentences.english: They celebrate his birthday with a dance party.
sentences.chinese: 他們舉辦一個舞會來慶祝他的生日。

sentences.english: In addition, the arable land area in Wushuihe river basin was correspondently enlarged during the period of the past 15 years.
sentences.chinese: 從土地利用變化來看，舞水河流域耕地面積不斷擴大。

sentences.english: I just followed his lead. But what was that?
sentences.chinese: 我就是跟着領舞的那個人。但這是什麼舞？

sentences.english: She ran outside and danced in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 她跑到外面，在雪地裏跳起了舞。

sentences.english: Xiao Niang cited slow dance for a while.
The number of wagging dances per minute told the exact distance to the feeding place.
sentences.chinese: 每分鐘擺尾舞的次數表明了到餵食處的精確距離。

sentences.english: This chopstick dance comes from Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 筷子舞起源於蒙古的舞蹈。

sentences.english: Sorry , I think I'll sit out the next dance .
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我想坐會兒，等過了下個舞再跳。

sentences.english: I had two dances with Lucy.
The young girls and boys boogied all night long.
sentences.chinese: 那些少男少女跳了個通宵的迪斯科舞。

sentences.english: She does well in English and dancing.
sentences.chinese: 她英語學得好，舞跳得也很棒。

sentences.english: You dance well. Do you breakdance?
sentences.chinese: 你的舞跳得真好，你跳霹靂舞嗎？

sentences.english: Stranded wonderful spread tongue, is like a song you dance the last empress dowager.
sentences.chinese: 舌間擱淺的妙蔓，是想爲你舞一曲最後傾國傾城。

sentences.english: Light a candle, pull me closer, to dance a song or two.
sentences.chinese: 點上蠟燭，拉我入懷，跳幾支舞吧。

sentences.english: May I have the pleasure of having the next dance with her?
sentences.chinese: 我可以請她跳下一曲舞嗎？

definition: to move as in a dance/to wave (some implement)/to flourish/(of eyes, hands etc) to dance/to flutter
to be a dancing partner to sb/to perform as a backup dancer/taxi dancer (hired dancing partner)/escort
to sing and dance/general term for a round dance
Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
